      • Login

        public void Login(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        checks to see if the user exists and what type of user is logging in
        Parameters:

      • studentLogin

        public void studentLogin()
        when a student logs in, this method casts the current controller as a StudentsController and opens the fxml file for the student dashboard

      • adminLogin

        public void adminLogin()
        when an admin logs in, this method casts the current controller as a AdminController and opens the fxml file for the admin dashboard

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName(java.lang.String username,
                                java.lang.String password)
        a static method used to return the ID of the user logged in if the user was a student, helps the creation of the student slip. Uses the username and password entered in the app to determine the userID.
        Parameters:
        username - username used to find SQL entry
        password - password used to find SQL entry
        Returns:
        a String containing the ID of the student that logged in.
